name: API 600 Gate Valve 6" Class 600
shortDescription: Carbon steel bolted-bonnet gate valve for high-pressure oil & gas service.
longDescription: Rugged OS&Y gate valve designed in accordance with API 600 and ASME B16.34 for onshore oil & gas facilities, pipelines and process plants. Suitable for crude oil, produced water and utility services where tight shut-off and long-term reliability are critical.

specs.Construction: Outside Screw & Yoke (OS&Y), rising stem, bolted bonnet
specs.Service: Crude oil, produced water, gas, utility lines

name: Globe Control Valve 2" Class 300 – Pneumatic Actuator
shortDescription: Two-inch globe control valve with pneumatic actuator, suitable for flow and pressure control loops.
longDescription: Compact control valve assembly for oil & gas process applications, supplied with positioner and accessories as per project specification. Available with different trim characteristics (EQ%, linear) and materials for wide range of media and temperatures.

name: Pressure Transmitter 0–100 bar, 4–20 mA + HART
shortDescription: Smart pressure transmitter with stainless steel wetted parts for harsh oil & gas environments.
longDescription: Field-proven pressure transmitter suitable for wellhead, process and utility services. Provides stable 4–20 mA + HART signal for integration with DCS / PLC systems and supports remote configuration via hand-held communicator.

name: SCBA Set – 300 bar, 6.8 L Composite Cylinder
shortDescription: Self-contained breathing apparatus compliant with EN standards for firefighting teams in oil & gas fields.
longDescription: Complete SCBA set including full face mask, demand valve, composite cylinder and ergonomic back plate harness. Suitable for firefighting and emergency response teams in production facilities, tank farms and pipelines.

specs.Mask: Full face panoramic, wide field of vision
